title: Risky Business 80s script
content:
This one looks vaguely familiar. Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [RiskyBusiness.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119125507/http:/typophile.com/files/RiskyBusiness.gif) | 22.71 KB |

 [‹ COWI Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119125507/http:/typophile.com/node/16321 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) We have the Revolving Book Case - Maiandra GD {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119125507/http:/typophile.com/node/16309 "Go to next forum topic")
author: trajkov

comments.content: This looks familiar because it is a lettering style that was very popular in the 80s. I suspect this is hand lettered and wouldn’t know of any equivalent digital script font. There are fonts in the same vein though, for example [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119125507/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%252BBureau)’s [Raceway](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119125507/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.9430.0.2&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Risky+Business&sampleSize=24).
